long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time and avoid repetitive typing with our extension! Easily save any text, then right-click on an input field to access a context menu with your saved items. Perfect for filling in custom fields like LinkedIn profiles, portfolio URLs, and more. Just hover over the menu, select your saved text, and you're done! All data is kept locally for your privacy. Simple, convenient, and efficient.
